scenario_text.value:
I’m telling you, it’s a bad idea! We’re just
kids! Exploring could get us killed!

We can’t just sit around twiddling our
thumbs, huh? We should at least look around!

So what are we supposed to do? Just sit here?
We should at least look around!

Indeed. Fully understanding one’s situation
is essential for survival.

I... I’m with Shuuji. It’s safer in here than
it is out there.

And I agree with Aoi! Better not to take any
chances!

Right, and I am not about to put any of you
at risk.

The professor wanted me to get all of you
home safe, and that’s...that’s what I’ll do!

The professor wanted me to get all of you
home safe, and that’s...that’s what I’ll do!
Oh? So what’s your plan to get us home?

I...I don’t know! But still! I’m not losing
anyone else!

I don’t know how to make it happen yet, but
we’re all going back together!
Shuuji...

Look, I’m with you on that, but that’s just
why we need to get out there!

How do you expect us to learn anything if we
stay holed up in here?

Besides, we may have enough food and water
for now, but it’s not gonna last forever.

It’s not! You’re right! But that’s not the
same point.

Hmm... I think I’m with Minoru on this one.
Staying here isn’t going to do us any good.
Really, Saki?

Yeah, I mean, who knows how long we’ll even
be able to stay safe like this?

That’s true. We don’t know what might happen...
No matter whether we stay here or go outside.

Right? And if we’re in danger either way, why
not go out and try to find a way home?

I can see your point, but do you think it’s
really worth the extra risk?
Any other thoughts? Ryo?
*mumble* *mumble*
He’s been like that since yesterday.
Kew...kew...

I guess we’ll take that as a no, then. Uh,
Miyuki? Haru? What do you think we should do?
I dunno.
Dunno....
I dunno.
Dunno...

Right, then. So the three of you are not
voting right now.
Oh, Takuma! Good timing!

Uh, what’s going on? I thought this was just
going to be a discussion.
You guys got real loud!

Well, so far opinion’s been split down the
middle. What’s your take on this, Takuma?
You...want to know what I think?

Yeah. Should we scout out the area, or stay
here and keep a low profile?
And...whatever I say is what we’ll do?
Oh, I like that. Let Takuma have final say.
I don’t know, seems like a big decision.
(What should we do?)
We should look around.
Let’s wait and see.
We should look around.

I think we should explore and see what we can
learn.
I knew you’d make the right call!
But...but what if we get attacked again?
We fight back, like last time!
And what makes you so sure we’ll win?
Uh, well, I mean...
He’s got a point.

And either way, it’s really scary being in
a fight.
Let’s wait and see.

I think we should stay here for a while and
see what happens.
Phew... That’s what I think too.

But for how long? When exactly do we get
rescued?

That’s right! We don’t even know if we will
get rescued. We gotta find our own way back!
And how do we do that?
That...I’m not so sure about.

So your whole plan is to just blindly search
for some clue? No way! That’s too reckless!

What other option is there? You want to just
sit here?! What’s that going to accomplish?

Things could change! The monsters might
vanish, or a way to return might appear...

Yeah, well, I’d rather take my chances out
there than wait around for that to happen.

But we can’t just head out there with nothing
to go on! We’d be risking death!

Hey, how long is this going to go on for? I’m
bored.

No need to be rude. Though the conversation
does seem to have reached an impasse.

Okay, calm down, you two. Fighting like this
isn’t going to solve anything.

Why don’t you both try and cool down for
a bit?
Yeah...I guess that’s fair.
Um, yes... Let’s do that.

All right, let’s all take some time to think
this over again.

Then we can pick things up when we get
together for lunch. How’s that sound?
Works for me.
Phew... Yes. Let’s do that.

Then we’re agreed. Let’s finish breakfast,
then stop for a break.
